issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

resolution.description: A fix for this issue is checked into the tree and tested.
resolution.name: Fixed

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

components.name: Alloy
components.description: Please enter tickets related to the Alloy here.

fields.description:
I'm trying to call any Admob ad, without successs.

I downloaded the module and am using the documentation found here: 
https://github.com/appcelerator-modules/ti.admob/blob/master/android/documentation/index.md

I'm using the exact code found in the sample inside the module, getting error code 1

Can anyone help me please?
fields.environment: OS X Yosemite 10.10.5, Titanium SDK 5.3.0, mac mini

comments.body:
Hi,
Thanks for reaching out.
Can you be more specific about your issue like provide a screenshot of error message, module version, testing devices details. so that we can dig into and help you out.
Regards,
Aminul

Hi Aminul,

I've managed to show banner, but I can't find the documentation to show other ads. 

I had to add flags to the manifest file to be able to show the banner, and that it's not documented properly.

But I think this issue is solved, thanks.
Hello [~wilsondgk@gmail.com], Can  you create a PR on the documentation improvement? We will merge it in our module documentation. Thanks.
